topic.title: How can I use ZeroNet on 2 pc?

> [andax](#comment_5_1D8TYfuxwgwt6q3Qf5fKNDqFH1ztqJfZaH): i do not have tor running

Lol,this website in dark net you need use tor if you want to connect to website)

1558666037_1BGbyM8MfxFyJ8xwDkApNMexZTGAk.body:
> [akalai](#comment_11_12nqeX4e52siyux2s9AGpdUK2ZB5Qv3vLG): Make one. Most darknet marketplaces would switch to zeronet(you can't ever take the site offline, etc...) if zeronet had more exposure/users. The most challenging part would be securing the site and user data but Zeronet is (unfortunately) the best place to host something illegal like a market place.

Why ZeroNet ?

1559892958_1NFEZa8hNrGfpw1EK4yRPWVquQJi5.body:
> [wanditoast](#comment_21_1LJMKSLPgM8fqQSMRrLzWB2DhVm1zoEVfZ): build a freenas machine and set your data directory on it.change you configdata_dir = path to your nas [...]

Thank you

> [anal](#comment_14_1DSnM3xHWxHbkHCADMTfhvXMfZDE34vwQJ): Just put your ZN on an USB key.

Tnx;)
